item.title: Can someone explain a function that return an array in c
item.dc:creator: jeff
item.description:
Whatever comes before the the function name is the return type, in this case it‚Äôs a int * ( a pointer to an int), so this function returns a pointer to an integer, or as you said an array of integers

}
